sqlMap.statement:
select @RNUM:=0, Q.* from ( select SEQ_ID, MASTER_SEQ_ID, DOMAIN, SITE_NAME, SITE_ID, SITE_PASSWD, USE_YN, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME from SITE_PRIVATE where WRITER_SEQ_ID = #USER_SEQ_ID# order by WRITE_DATETIME desc ) Q where 1=1
$SEARCH_KEY$ like concat('%', #SEARCH_VALUE#, '%')

select @RNUM:=0, Q.* from ( select S.SEQ_ID, S.MASTER_SEQ_ID, S.DOMAIN, S.SITE_NAME, S.SITE_ID, S.SITE_PASSWD, S.USE_YN, S.WRITER_SEQ_ID, S.WRITER_ID, S.WRITE_DATETIME from AUTOWRITE_RESERVE_SITE R, SITE_PRIVATE S where R.RESERVE_MASTER_SEQ_ID = #RESERVE_MASTER_SEQ_ID# AND S.SEQ_ID = R.SITE_SEQ_ID order by SEQ_ID desc ) Q where 1=1
$SEARCH_KEY$ like concat('%', #SEARCH_VALUE#, '%')

select @RNUM:=0, Q.* from ( select SEQ_ID, DOMAIN, SITE_NAME, SITE_ID_KEY, SITE_PASSWD_KEY, LOGIN_URL, WRITE_URL, MODIFY_URL, DELETE_URL, LOGIN_TYPE, WRITE_TYPE, MODIFY_TYPE, DELETE_TYPE, SERVICE_CLASS_NAME, SITE_ENCODING, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME from SITE_MASTER order by WRITE_DATETIME desc ) Q where 1=1
$SEARCH_KEY$ like concat('%', #SEARCH_VALUE#, '%')

insert into SITE_PRIVATE ( MASTER_SEQ_ID , DOMAIN , SITE_NAME , SITE_ID, SITE_PASSWD , SITE_KEYWORD, SITE_CATEGORY, SITE_REGION, SITE_SUB_REGION , USE_YN, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME ) values ( #MASTER_SEQ_ID# , (select DOMAIN from SITE_MASTER where SEQ_ID = #MASTER_SEQ_ID#) , (select SITE_NAME from SITE_MASTER where SEQ_ID = #MASTER_SEQ_ID#) , #SITE_ID#, #SITE_PASSWD# , #SITE_KEYWORD#, #SITE_CATEGORY#, #SITE_REGION#, #SITE_SUB_REGION# , #USE_YN#, #WRITER_SEQ_ID#, #WRITER_ID#, sysdate() )

insert into SITE_MASTER ( DOMAIN, SITE_NAME, SITE_ID_KEY, SITE_PASSWD_KEY, LOGIN_URL, WRITE_URL, MODIFY_URL, DELETE_URL, LOGIN_TYPE, WRITE_TYPE, MODIFY_TYPE, DELETE_TYPE, SERVICE_CLASS_NAME, SITE_ENCODING, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME ) values ( #DOMAIN#, #SITE_NAME#, #SITE_ID_KEY#, #SITE_PASSWD_KEY#, #LOGIN_URL#, #WRITE_URL#, #MODIFY_URL#, #DELETE_URL#, #LOGIN_TYPE#, #WRITE_TYPE#, #MODIFY_TYPE#, #DELETE_TYPE#, #SERVICE_CLASS_NAME#, #SITE_ENCODING#, #WRITER_SEQ_ID#, #WRITER_ID#, sysdate() )

update SITE_PRIVATE set MASTER_SEQ_ID = #MASTER_SEQ_ID#, DOMAIN = (select DOMAIN from SITE_MASTER where SEQ_ID = #MASTER_SEQ_ID#), SITE_NAME = (select SITE_NAME from SITE_MASTER where SEQ_ID = #MASTER_SEQ_ID#), SITE_ID = #SITE_ID#, SITE_PASSWD = #SITE_PASSWD#, SITE_KEYWORD = #SITE_KEYWORD#, SITE_CATEGORY = #SITE_CATEGORY#, SITE_REGION = #SITE_REGION#, SITE_SUB_REGION = #SITE_SUB_REGION#, USE_YN = #USE_YN#, WRITER_SEQ_ID = #WRITER_SEQ_ID#, WRITER_ID = #WRITER_ID# where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#

update SITE_MASTER set DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#, SITE_NAME = #SITE_NAME#, SITE_ID_KEY = #SITE_ID_KEY#, SITE_PASSWD_KEY = #SITE_PASSWD_KEY#, LOGIN_URL = #LOGIN_URL#, WRITE_URL = #WRITE_URL#, MODIFY_URL = #MODIFY_URL#, DELETE_URL = #DELETE_URL#, LOGIN_TYPE = #LOGIN_TYPE#, WRITE_TYPE = #WRITE_TYPE#, MODIFY_TYPE = #MODIFY_TYPE#, DELETE_TYPE = #DELETE_TYPE#, SERVICE_CLASS_NAME = #SERVICE_CLASS_NAME#, SITE_ENCODING = #SITE_ENCODING#, WRITER_SEQ_ID = #WRITER_SEQ_ID#, WRITER_ID = #WRITER_ID# where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#

select SEQ_ID, MASTER_SEQ_ID, DOMAIN, SITE_NAME, SITE_ID, SITE_PASSWD , SITE_KEYWORD, SITE_CATEGORY, SITE_REGION, SITE_SUB_REGION , USE_YN, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME from SITE_PRIVATE where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#

select SEQ_ID, DOMAIN, SITE_NAME, SITE_ID_KEY, SITE_PASSWD_KEY, LOGIN_URL, WRITE_URL, MODIFY_URL, DELETE_URL, LOGIN_TYPE, WRITE_TYPE, MODIFY_TYPE, DELETE_TYPE, SERVICE_CLASS_NAME, SITE_ENCODING, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME from SITE_MASTER where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#
delete from SITE_PRIVATE where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#
delete from SITE_MASTER where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#
select SEQ_ID, MASTER_SEQ_ID, MODE, P_KEY, P_VALUE from SITE_PARAMETER where MASTER_SEQ_ID = #SITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID# order by SEQ_ID desc

select count(1) from ( select @RNUM:=0, Q.* from ( select * from SITE_CATEGORY where 1=1
MASTER_SEQ_ID = #MASTER_SEQ_ID#
order by WRITE_DATETIME desc ) Q where 1=1
MASTER_SEQ_ID = #MASTER_SEQ_ID#
) R

select @RNUM:=0, Q.* from ( select SEQ_ID, MASTER_SEQ_ID, CATEGORY_TYPE, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_VALUE, USE_YN, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME from SITE_CATEGORY where 1=1
MASTER_SEQ_ID = #MASTER_SEQ_ID#
order by WRITE_DATETIME desc ) Q where 1=1
MASTER_SEQ_ID = #MASTER_SEQ_ID#

update SITE_CATEGORY set MASTER_SEQ_ID = #MASTER_SEQ_ID#, CATEGORY_TYPE = #CATEGORY_TYPE#, CATEGORY_NAME = #CATEGORY_NAME#, CATEGORY_VALUE = #CATEGORY_VALUE#, USE_YN = #USE_YN#, WRITER_SEQ_ID = #WRITER_SEQ_ID#, WRITER_ID = #WRITER_ID# where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#
select SEQ_ID, MASTER_SEQ_ID, CATEGORY_TYPE, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_VALUE, USE_YN, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME from SITE_CATEGORY where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#
delete from SITE_CATEGORY where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#

select @RNUM:=0, Q.* from ( select SEQ_ID, CONTENTS_NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME from CONTENTS_MASTER where WRITER_SEQ_ID = #USER_SEQ_ID# order by WRITE_DATETIME desc ) Q where 1=1
$SEARCH_KEY$ like concat('%', #SEARCH_VALUE#, '%')
select SEQ_ID, CONTENTS_NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME from CONTENTS_MASTER where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#
delete from CONTENTS_MASTER where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#

select @RNUM:=0, Q.* from ( select SEQ_ID, USER_SEQ_ID, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_REGION , BUSINESS_TEL, BUSINESS_CATEGORY, BUSINESS_TIME , BUSINESS_PRICE, BUSINESS_ADDRESS, WRITE_DATETIME from U_INFO_BUSINESS where USER_SEQ_ID = #USER_SEQ_ID# order by WRITE_DATETIME desc ) Q where 1=1
$SEARCH_KEY$ like concat('%', #SEARCH_VALUE#, '%')

insert into U_INFO_BUSINESS ( SEQ_ID, USER_SEQ_ID, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_REGION , BUSINESS_TEL, BUSINESS_CATEGORY, BUSINESS_TIME , BUSINESS_PRICE, BUSINESS_ADDRESS, WRITE_DATETIME ) values ( #SEQ_ID#, #USER_SEQ_ID#, #BUSINESS_NAME#, #BUSINESS_REGION# , #BUSINESS_TEL#, #BUSINESS_CATEGORY#, #BUSINESS_TIME# , #BUSINESS_PRICE#, #BUSINESS_ADDRESS#, sysdate() )

select SEQ_ID, USER_SEQ_ID, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_REGION , BUSINESS_TEL, BUSINESS_CATEGORY, BUSINESS_TIME , BUSINESS_PRICE, BUSINESS_ADDRESS, WRITE_DATETIME from U_INFO_BUSINESS where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#
delete from U_INFO_BUSINESS where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#

update AUTOWRITE_RESERVE_MASTER set CONTENTS_SEQ_ID = #CONTENTS_SEQ_ID#, TITLE = #TITLE#, CONTENT = #CONTENT#, RESERVE_START_DATE = #RESERVE_START_DATE#, RESERVE_START_TIME = #RESERVE_START_TIME#, RESERVE_END_DATE = #RESERVE_END_DATE#, RESERVE_END_TIME = #RESERVE_END_TIME#, RESERVE_TERM = #RESERVE_TERM#, USE_YN = #USE_YN#, WRITER_SEQ_ID = #WRITER_SEQ_ID#, WRITER_ID = #WRITER_ID# where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into AUTOWRITE_RESERVE_MASTER ( CONTENTS_SEQ_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, RESERVE_START_DATE, RESERVE_START_TIME, RESERVE_END_DATE, RESERVE_END_TIME, RESERVE_TERM, USE_YN, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME ) values ( #CONTENTS_SEQ_ID#, #TITLE#, #CONTENT#, #RESERVE_START_DATE#, #RESERVE_START_TIME#, #RESERVE_END_DATE#, #RESERVE_END_TIME#, #RESERVE_TERM#, #USE_YN#, #WRITER_SEQ_ID#, #WRITER_ID#, sysdate() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.statement:
select @RNUM:=0, Q.* from ( select SEQ_ID, CONTENTS_SEQ_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME , (select count(1) from AUTOWRITE_SITE where AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID = M.SEQ_ID and SUCCESS_YN = 'Y') SUCCESS_COUNT , (select count(1) from AUTOWRITE_SITE where AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID = M.SEQ_ID and SUCCESS_YN = 'N') FAIL_COUNT from AUTOWRITE_MASTER M where WRITER_SEQ_ID = #USER_SEQ_ID# order by WRITE_DATETIME desc ) Q where 1=1
$SEARCH_KEY$ like concat('%', #SEARCH_VALUE#, '%')

select @RNUM:=0, Q.* from ( select SEQ_ID, CONTENTS_SEQ_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, RESERVE_START_DATE, RESERVE_START_TIME, RESERVE_END_DATE, RESERVE_END_TIME, RESERVE_TERM, USE_YN, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME from AUTOWRITE_RESERVE_MASTER where WRITER_SEQ_ID = #USER_SEQ_ID# order by WRITE_DATETIME desc ) Q where 1=1
$SEARCH_KEY$ like concat('%', #SEARCH_VALUE#, '%')

select @RNUM:=0, Q.* from ( select SEQ_ID, AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID, SITE_SEQ_ID, SUCCESS_YN, RESPONSE_CONTENT, TRY_COUNT, TRY_DATETIME , (select SITE_NAME from SITE_PRIVATE where SEQ_ID = S.SITE_SEQ_ID) as SITE_NAME from AUTOWRITE_SITE S where AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID = #AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID# order by TRY_DATETIME desc ) Q where 1=1
$SEARCH_KEY$ like concat('%', #SEARCH_VALUE#, '%')
select SITE_SEQ_ID from AUTOWRITE_SITE where AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID = #AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID#

select @RNUM:=0, Q.* from ( select SEQ_ID, AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID, AUTOWRITE_SITE_SEQ_ID, SITE_SEQ_ID, SUCCESS_YN, RESPONSE_CONTENT, TRY_DATETIME , (select SITE_NAME from SITE_PRIVATE where SEQ_ID = L.SITE_SEQ_ID) as SITE_NAME from AUTOWRITE_LOG L where AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID = #AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID# AND AUTOWRITE_SITE_SEQ_ID = #AUTOWRITE_SITE_SEQ_ID# order by TRY_DATETIME desc ) Q where 1=1
$SEARCH_KEY$ like concat('%', #SEARCH_VALUE#, '%')

select P.SEQ_ID, M.SEQ_ID AS MASTER_SEQ_ID, M.DOMAIN, M.SITE_NAME, P.SITE_ID, P.SITE_PASSWD , P.SITE_KEYWORD, P.SITE_CATEGORY, P.SITE_REGION, P.SITE_SUB_REGION , P.WRITER_SEQ_ID, P.WRITER_ID, P.WRITE_DATETIME , M.LOGIN_URL, M.WRITE_URL, M.MODIFY_URL, M.DELETE_URL , M.LOGIN_TYPE, M.WRITE_TYPE, M.MODIFY_TYPE, M.DELETE_TYPE , M.SITE_ID_KEY, M.SITE_PASSWD_KEY, M.SERVICE_CLASS_NAME, M.SITE_ENCODING from SITE_MASTER M, SITE_PRIVATE P where M.SEQ_ID = P.MASTER_SEQ_ID AND P.SEQ_ID = #SITE_SEQ_ID#
select SEQ_ID, CONTENTS_SEQ_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME from AUTOWRITE_MASTER where SEQ_ID = #AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID#

select SEQ_ID, CONTENTS_SEQ_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, RESERVE_START_DATE, RESERVE_START_TIME, RESERVE_END_DATE, RESERVE_END_TIME, RESERVE_TERM, USE_YN, WRITER_SEQ_ID, WRITER_ID, WRITE_DATETIME from AUTOWRITE_RESERVE_MASTER where SEQ_ID = #RESERVE_MASTER_SEQ_ID#
select SITE_SEQ_ID from AUTOWRITE_RESERVE_SITE where RESERVE_MASTER_SEQ_ID = #RESERVE_MASTER_SEQ_ID#
delete from AUTOWRITE_RESERVE_MASTER where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#
delete from AUTOWRITE_RESERVE_SITE where RESERVE_MASTER_SEQ_ID = #RESERVE_MASTER_SEQ_ID#
delete from AUTOWRITE_MASTER where SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#
delete from AUTOWRITE_SITE where AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#
delete from AUTOWRITE_LOG where AUTOWRITE_MASTER_SEQ_ID = #SEQ_ID#
